name: Beet Foogath (Beet Coconut Stir-Fry)
description: This gorgeous, bright red stir-fry is a wonderful way to savor the flavor of the beet. It's mildly spiced and the coconut adds a lovely textural contrast.
recipeIngredient: 3 small hot green chilis, slit lengthwise
4 medium beets, boiled and cubed (about 3 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a large saucepan until shimmering. Add chilis, mustard seed, and curry leaves. Stir vigorously until fragrant and the mustard starts to pop, about 3 minutes. Add the beetroot and stir until the beets are coated in spices. Add the coconut and stir until mixed through. Serve warm or cold with any Indian meal as a side or salad.
